verbs.description: [ARG0: russian] mp [V: says] [ARG1: britain is behaving like hitler over salisbury nerve gas attack blaming russia is a fantasy he says ukraine yulia vitaly milonov sergei skripal united russia nerve agent theresa may radosław sikorski russia hitler]

russian mp says britain [V: is] behaving like hitler over salisbury nerve gas attack blaming russia is a fantasy he says ukraine yulia vitaly milonov sergei skripal united russia nerve agent theresa may radosław sikorski russia hitler
